text: Map of the counties in the Lands of the Crown of St. Stephen (the Kingdom of Hungary proper and Croatia-Slavonia) around 1880 Proportion of Hungarians in Hungary, 1890 census based on the most commonly spoken languages This article is a list census data of counties in the Kingdom of Hungary during the time period between 1715 and 1910. The list contains only 39 counties of the total 72 counties of pre Trianon Hungary. ==Census data of Hungary (proper)== (The data doesn't include the population of the counties of present-day Hungary) ===Abaúj-Torna=== 1910 census (population by language) {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" class="toccolours" style="align:left;
